text: XVI International Orthodox Film Festival "Pokrov" is a film festival of short feature and animated films on Orthodox and family educational themes, which took place from 8 to 11 October, 2018 in Kyiv. == Features == The 2018 Pokrov Festival is dedicated to the 30th anniversary of the revival of the Holy Dormition Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra. == Winners == About 200 works were sent to the festival organizing committee. 70 films from Ukraine, Belarus, Georgia, Poland, Bosnia and Herzegovina, India, Serbia, and Russia have been selected to be shown at the capital's "House of Cinema" (6 Saksaganskogo St.). == Link == * == Notes == Category:October 2018 events
title: 16th International Orthodox Film Festival "Pokrov"
